Name: trftype
Description: OID of the data type this transform is for

Name: trflang
Description: OID of the language this transform is for

Name: trffromsql
Description: The OID of the function to use when converting the data type for input to the procedural language (e.g., function parameters). Zero is stored if the default behavior should be used.

Name: trftosql
Description: The OID of the function to use when converting output from the procedural language (e.g., return values) to the data type. Zero is stored if the default behavior should be used.
